title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add the hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta and toss to combine.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.
Garnish with fresh parsley and enjoy!

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken chunks in yogurt and half of the tikka masala spice for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through and slightly charred. Set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter over medium heat and saut√© onions until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in remaining tikka masala spice and cook for 30 seconds.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens.
Stir in heavy cream and add the cooked chicken pieces.
Simmer for another 5-10 minutes, adjusting seasoning with salt.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan bread.
